Description:
Check hashes:
- if (network - disk) match: OK
- if (network - db remote) match, but (disk - db local) mismatch: local version updated, upload new version
- if (disk - db local) match, but (network - db remote) mismatch: remote version updated, download new version
- else: local and remote version updated, conflict.

Local delete - check hashes: 
- if (db local - network) match: file was not updated, delete.
- else: download

Local add, but network version already exists - check hashes: 
- if (network - disk) match: OK
- else: conflict
Unknown remote file: file was not downloaded yet

Remote add, but file already exists on disk (DB not updated yet?) - check hashes:
- if (disk - network) match: OK
- if (network - local db) match: file updated locally, upload new version
- else: conflict
Local delete and remote add: download again

Remote add and local add - check hashes:
- if (network - disk) match: OK, update DB
- else: conflict

Remote delete - check hashes:
- if (disk - local db) mismatch: file was updated, add it again
- else: delete local file
Remote delete and local delete: delete
Remote delete and local add: add again
Remote file deleted, but unknown to client.
Existing file, but unknown to network.
Local file deleted, but unknown to network.
